description:
'A Ice Cream Scoop Dessert Builder Free Frozen Treats for Kids
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
YUM!!!! Little chef’s let’s make ice creams. The most delicious Ice Cream game is now available on your mobile phone. You fingers won’t be able to resist it.

Your memory skills will be challenged all throughout the game. Also, as you progress through this fun game, you will unlock new ingredients making levels harder and harder to complete.

Mix and match to create the most YUMMY dessert

Features:

=> Awesome Graphics & Fabulous sound effects!
=> Intuitive icons and navigation.
=> Music rhythm that follows the level of the game!
=> Different Single Ice Pop Molds.
=> Easy to play and suitable!
=> Decorate with tons of delicious toppings!
=> Tons of flavors and toppings to choose from.
Cooking and making is fun. Make ice creams and eat them with friends and family.
Downloads Now!!
